description: Describes external Receiver transport parameters defined in the Transport Parameters register of the NMOS Parameter Registers. The constraints in this schema are minimum constraints, but may be further constrained at the constraints endpoint.
title: External Receiver Transport Parameters
Receiver Output

ext_is_07_source_id.description: Identifies the Source that emits an IS-07 event. A null value indicates that the source has not been configured.

ext_is_07_rest_api_url.description: URL of the Events API resource providing the current state and type of an Event emitter (Source). A null value indicates that the source has not been configured.

ext_link_offset_delay.description: Identifies the Link Offset Delay (microseconds) used to synchronise Playout Time of all components of a stream by receivers. If auto is set, the minimum achievable delay is selected.
